p: Determination of moisture content (MC) in the VCO was based on the American Oil Chemists Society (Firestone, 2009) method. About 5.0 g of the VCO sample was placed into a pre‐heated and pre‐weighed crucible with lid, and then heated at 105°C for at least 24 hr. The sample was then placed in a desiccator and allowed to cool down to room temperature. The crucible containing the VCO was then re‐weighed. The moisture and volatile content was calculated using the following formula;
